segments.text: Oh , no . It looks like my computer really has caught a virus .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why ? Did you open an attachment ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , something called “ George W . Bush . ” An hour later , all I see are pictures of George W . Bush in women's clothes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I kind of like it . He looks better that way , doesn't he ? More presidential .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I preferred the forward with pictures of him side-by-side with monkeys .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , their expressions were exactly the same !
segments.speaker: S2
